metadata.dc:subject: PITUITARY GLAND, ANTERIOR/physiology
ADRENAL GLANDS/effect of excision
PARABIOSIS
metadata.dc:title: Alteraciones prehipofisarias producidas por la suprarrenalectomia bilateral en ratas parabiosadas: estudio estadistico y estructural.
[Anterior pituitary gland changes produced by bilateral adrenalectomy in parabiotic rats: statistical and structural study].
